item.title: Web App - UI/UX optimization
item.description: In UAT testing now. Also fixed some UX experience based on Users feedback. Click cards in Introduction page, now will go to next step. Fixed double title when scrolling the card explanation. Fixed the English explanation oversized in card. Optimized the UI effect in button. Fixed some special characters in card explanation.

item.title: Web App - Refactor by Next.js + Optimize UX flow
item.description: In UAT testing now. Also fixed some UX experience based on Users feedback. Fixed lag animation and optimization performance (remove transition all). Removed confused Poe description. Switch the step of meditation and choose spread. Deploy service to new domain. Optimized SEO by using Next.js to refactor service.

item.title: Developed Web App
item.description: Embarking on the journey of learning frontend software technologies and developing the Miri web version using React.js. For this version, UI flow is designed using Figma, and the content originally present in the Line chatbot is reconstructed for the web. Additionally, Tarot card divination explanations are made available. The Line and Telegram chatbots may eventually become part of history.

item.title: Line Chatbot x Telegram Chatbot - Create additional 5 new divination methods
item.description: Following the completion of the second job experience, version 1.2 introduced a Telegram chatbot version. In addition to the existing Runes divination method, six new divination methods were added: Runes, Tarot Card Reading, Lenormand Card Reading, Temple Poe (筊杯), Nature Whispers Phrase Cards, and Inspirational Wisdom Sentences. The Tarot Card Reading feature in this version is limited to card drawing, with no available interpretations.

item.title: Line Chatbot - Developed Rune divination
item.description: Following the first job experience, version 1.1 saw Miri redefining its focus as an online fortune-telling and divination service. The initial divination method, Runes divnation, was introduced in the Line chatbot version.

item.title: Create Line Chatbot
item.description: Miri Robot fortune-teller, was originally conceived as a chatbot, and the initial version was developed as a Line chatbot. The name Miri was chosen as a homage to Apple’s Siri.
